bad_bcd_queries.explanation: No BCD data for query: api.RTCRtpStreamStats.ssrc

title: RTCRtpStreamStats: ssrc property
summary:
The RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary's
  ssrc property provides the Synchronization Source
  (SSRC), an integer which uniquely identifies the source of the RTP
  packets whose statistics are covered by the RTCStatsReport that
  includes this RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary.
pageTitle: RTCRtpStreamStats: ssrc property - Web APIs | MDN
